title: Questiontype matrix_circle options
description: Description of the options of the Questiontype 'matrix_circle'

items.description: The options of this questiontype are in the first and only Array element

ausrichtung.description: Choose one from ['horizontal', 'vertikal', 'diagonal']. Sets the alignment of matrix. 'diagonal' is default if empty or missing

dritteDimension.description: The name of the third dimension thats shown on the top of the page and is influenced by the circle

kreisgröße.description: The maximum size/radius of the circle. If empty or missing, the program defaults to 40px
